reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and appreciate its soft texture. They describe it as cozy and not itchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun Santa sweater!
items.body: This is really cute - sparkly Santa hat, fuzzy beard, terrific green color. I’m really sensitive to itchy or scratchy fabric, and this was neither. Excited to wear to our Christmas party! Read more
items.author: Lab2

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas sweater
items.body: So cute and cozy! True to size. I’m a L and it’s not itchy! Read more
items.author: Micaela McCoy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and cozy
items.body: Love this sweater. Bought it for a Christmas party for my “ugly sweater” and I found my self wearing it out because I love it soo much. Fits well, good quality and it’s soft. Can’t wait to bring it out for the holidays next year Read more
items.author: Fritzl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soooo cozy
items.body: This is the best ugly Christmas sweater! It's soft, stretchy and true to size. It will definitely keep you warm on those could winter days Read more
items.author: Becca

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Really adorable on! Nice material, not too heavy. Read more
items.author: Lisa Stiglich

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ewww so cute!
items.body: So fun for work holiday event! I received so many compliments. Had to fluff Santa's beard but worth it. Read more
items.author: Millie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I think it's cute!
items.body: This comes in a very vacuum-sealed package and requires some fluffing before wearing. I really like the green color and the Santa hats have red tinsel fabric so it's almost a little chic in that regard. With that said, I would have liked to see the Santas on the back of the sweater as they are only on the front. It's also pretty thin and does require a tank top underneath. Despite that, I am looking forward to wearing it to my company's holiday party. I ordered a Small and usually I wear a Medium in tops and this is perfectly sized and loose-fitting. Read more
items.author: MK Mack

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kind of cute, not so ugly
items.body: I only have ugly Christmas dresses, so I wanted to get something to wear on my virtual holiday party calls. This caught my eye with the fluffy Santa beard and I got it in green, so that the red hats would clash perfectly. It ended up being super cute and actually something I would wear in public and not just for an ugly sweater party. The sweater is oversized, so I didn't have any issues with needing to size up. The sleeves were really nicely ballooned with a cinched in sleeve cuff. I appreciated that the Santa faces wrapped around the full sleeve, but would have loved if they continued on the back as well. Read more
items.author: KL

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Pink, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
